headline: Ethisphere Names A. O. Smith Corporation One of the 2025 World's Most Ethical Companies® for the Second Time
summary: A. O. Smith Corporation (NYSE: AOS), a leader in water heating and water treatment, announces today it has been recognized as a 2025 World's Most Ethical Company by Ethisphere, a global leader in defining and advancing the standards of ethical business practices.
